actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Dr. Enrico Fermi.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Postmaster General to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Doctor Enrico Fermi.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Dr. Enrico Fermi.
